author: stas
msg: To improve the usability of the IO tracing dump only the first few dozens
of characters in the string being written, read or flushed

author: stas
msg: don't rely on Accept-Charset on the server side to figure out what the encoding the
POSTed data is in (this is misleading). It should be used only to decide which
encoding to use to respond with

author: stas
msg: constants don't survive MakeMaker's move of MY:: functions to a different
namespace, therefore use a lexical $apache_test_install instead of a
